name: PacMan1.0
description:
Controls

Use arrow keys to move through the level

Description

This game I made was from a tutorial. I am learning to use Game Maker and this is the result 

Games was develop a few years back from a tutorial to learn how to use game maker studio 2, I have lost the file to continue the development but this was the last executable I made.

Thanks to Adderly Céspedes  from 2DD entertainment LTD

Inspired from the famous #Arcade game from Nintendo Co., Ltd  #PacMan
